pages.text:
[Page Title: Trio Nightclub in Charleston, SC]

where charleston comes to party

Welcome to Trio Charleston — a premier DJ nightclub in the heart of Charleston and the only venue in the city featuring world-renowned DJs from around the globe. With high-energy music from both international and local talent, a packed dance floor, hospitable VIP, and an unforgettable late-night atmosphere, every night here feels like the main event.

Upcoming shows

12.31
Click Here CHARLESTON’S PREMIEREDM NIGHTCLUB 
VOTED CHARLESTON’S BEST BAR, BEST GIRLS NIGHT OUT & BEST NIGHTCLUB
Featuring the most technologically-advanced light and video production in the country, Trio offers patrons and partygoers headline DJs and prime entertainment paired with an elevated experience and best-in-class service. Signature offerings include VIP table service, bachelor/bachelorette parties, private events, retail and more. 
— Stevie h.
“As a local downtown Charleston resident, this is my favorite night club to go to in Charleston. From the friendly staff, to the amazing production and equipment to booking the best and upcoming artists and music- this is the place to BE on a Friday or Saturday night. Since I’ve been going here regularly for over a year now, the owner, management, security and other team members have been nothing but friendly and kind to me, always checking in and making sure I’m comfortable and enjoying my night.” 
VIP TABLE SERVICE
Book Now BACHELORETTE PARTies Book Now 
— Hailey B.
“I came to Trio as I was in Charleston for my bachelorette party. We walked in and I was mind blown. The club is so Sophisticated and classy looking. We were asked if we wanted a bottle of Champagne free of charge I’m assuming due to my getting married. We were sat in VIP and brought the bottle along with a whole little light show. It was the best experience. Everyone was so nice including the bouncers and all the girls that work there. We will definitely be visiting again and going to Trio!” 
TRIO SOUND, LIGHTING, & SPECIAL EFFECTS SYSTEMS

DAS Audio | iDesign Productions

TRIO IS THE FIRST CLUB WORLDWIDE TO FEATURE THE NEW E11EVEN SOUND PROTOTYPE SOUND SYSTEM BY DAS AUDIO. THE UPSTAIRS NIGHTCLUB FEATURES (4) ES10 LOUDSPEAKERS WITH (2) ES218 SUBS POWERED BY FFA10000 AND MC2 AMPLIFIERS. THE SYSTEM WAS DESIGNED BY IDESIGN PRODUCTIONS WHO ALSO IS THE AV PROVIDER FOR E11EVEN MIAMI. THE DJ BOOTH CONSISTS OF (2) DAS AUDIO A&A MID/HIGHS AND (1) A18A SUB. THE DJ BOOTH FEATURES PIONEER DJ PRODUCTS TO INCLUDE (4) CDJ2000 NEXUS 2 AND PIONEER DJM900 NEXUS 2 MIXER AND HAS AMPLE SPACE FOR ARTISTS’ GUESTS. THE MAIN FLOOR LOUNGE FEATURES DAS AUDIO ARTEC SERIES FOR MID/HIGHS AND VANTEC SERIES FOR SUB BASS. THE SYSTEM IS POWERED WITH CREST AUDIO PROFESSIONAL POWER SERIES. ALL AREAS HAVE THEIR OWN SIGNAL PROCESSING TO ENSURE PERFECT SOUND QUALITY.TRIO’S UPSTAIRS NIGHTCLUB IS EQUIPPED WITH A FULL (16) PANEL 3.9 MILLIMETER LED VIDEO WALL, IN ADDITION TO (251) 5 MILLIMETER LED VIDEO BARS BEHIND THE DJ AND OVERHEAD TO CREATE A ONE-OF-A-KIND IMMERSIVE VIDEO EXPERIENCE. THE FULL CAMEO LIGHT DESIGN INCLUDES (16) 360 DEGREE DIRECTIONAL MOVO BEAMS, (4) 5 WATT D-FORCE LAZERS, (10) Q-SPOT DOWN LIGHTS, AND (68) RGB DOTS IN THE GRID. ALL VIDEO IS PROGRAMMED IN AN AVOLITES AI MEDIA SERVER AND CONTROLLED WITH THE GrandMA WING WITH X-TOUCH. THE CAMEO HAZE 1500 PRO SETS THE MOOD, WHILE THE FULLY INTEGRATED KRYOGENIFEX LIQUID NITROGEN SYSTEM PROVIDES A ONE-OF-A-KIND EXHILARATING EXPERIENCE.

THE HOTTEST NIGHTCLUB in Charleston

Whether you’re having a bachelorette party or making a pit stop during your night out, Trio nightclub is your new electronic music destination. We’ve been the hidden gem of the Charleston, SC nightlife scene since 1994.Start your night by grabbing a drink or securing a private VIP table for your group and head to the dance floor for great music. We’re ready to make your next night out with friends memorable. Even if you’re flying solo, you can work the dance floor during our many live music events, featuring traveling DJs from across the world.Come check us out and see where all the locals hang out.Our club is the closest thing you’ll find to a Vegas or Miami-style club with out incredible lighting and sound systems. You’ll find that our amazingly upbeat atmosphere makes us stand out over other clubs in Charleston.
First Name Last Name Email Address Sign Up 
Thank you! #TakeMeToTrio

26
KREAM Thursday, February 26, 2026 9:00 PM 9:00 PM Google Calendar ICS 
KREAM COMES TO TRIO CHS ON FEBRUARY 26, 2026. TICKETS ON SALE FRIDAY 11/14!

KREAM feature the talents of Norwegian brothers Daniel and Markus Slettebakken. KREAM has gained worldwide attention for their unique take on melodic tech house. Initially discovered on SoundCloud through their remixes, their original music has now been played over a billion times.

Their one-of-a-kind LIQUID : LAB series on YouTube, has become one of the biggest online events in dance music. Broadcasting from Norway’s most unique places to over millions of viewers.
